info.name: Tolomeo Mega
info.description:
DESIGN BY:
Michele De Lucchi/Giancarlo Fassina

MATERIALS:
Polished aluminium base and cantilevered arms; diffuser in parchment paper on a plastic frame; joints in polished aluminium. Diffuser adjustable in all directions. System of spring balancing.

INFORMATIONS:
Led Total power 29Wn
warm white 3000Kn
Lighting Output 2100 lmn
Touch Dimmer /Cord Dimmer
